title: Improve the line editing capabilies
body: In Bash, there is no cut/paste up/down arrow. Can we improve the line editing like PowerShell?  Or is this a weakness of Bash itself?

comments.body: Linux-like bash command-line editing seems to work fine, for me.  (I start WSL/Ununtu/bash, and then "set -o vi".  I'm an old "vi" hack.)  I can do in-line editing, command history recall and search, history range reporting, etc.
